p.seg: The logical scope of 今 reaches down to 1.2!
"Constituting the area, how many (are) the items?
The subject changes abruptly: the topic of the size of areas is left in favour of a discussion of fractions.
§§§§§§§有"there are" has nothing to do with "one having" what there is. The translation intends the right thing but is infelicitous.
§§§§§§§§The crucial logical relation between the two fractions is "or".
§§§§§§§The logic of the Chinese is not made explicit, and the punctuation here is logically disastrously misleading. (The relation between the number and the fraction is one of addition.
§§§§§QUI NE LEUR CORRESPONDENT PAS: where is the Chinese for this?
the relative clause belongs into a footnote and is not part of the text.
One ought to try to bring out the way subtraction is construed by the Chinese Calculators: "by the amount of the lesser number one reduces the larger number"
the remainder one takes to be the dividend.

The relation of the translation to the Chinese text is opaque, and footnote 50 does not address the obvious problem. "The dividend is divided by the divisor to get to a single item/number." The 而一 very badly needs close interpretation.
